topics.title: Isomorphic Javascript
topics.description:
Topic Bullet Points:

• Introduce Divshot's need for code reuse between Node and browser

• Introduce the solution and it's implication (namely Browserify and the numerous modules that solve isomorphic javascript problems)  

• hyperquest  

• through  

• filereader-stream  

• Introduce Divshot's solution using isomorphic Node-style code

• Other various examples- Questions?

speaker.bio: Scott Corgan. Worked on Node since right before v0.6. Build E-commerce platforms, hosting platforms, and many many NPM modules. Currently working at Divshot as lead Node developer.
speaker.name: Scott Corgan
